This is the course webpage for Spatial Analysis (VIS 2128) at the Harvard 
Graduate School of Design.

# Course Topics

* Week 1: Finding and describing (spatial) data
* Week 2: Visualizing (spatial) data
* Week 3: Calculations within a data set
* Week 4: Distances, Centroids, and buffers
* Week 5: Relationships between data sets
* Week 6: Spatial sampling and clustering
* Week 7: Research questions
    
# Assignments

* [Assignment 1: Select and describe a dataset](https://c-voulgaris.github.io/VIS-2128-F22/a1-files/assignment-1.html){target="_blank"}
* Assignment 2: Remix a map
* Assignment 3: Generate new variables
* Assignment 4: Generate centroid, buffer, and walkshed layers
* Assignment 5: Generate variables based on spatial relationships
* Assignment 6: Generate random points and identify point clusters
* Assignment 7: Write a research plan
